book.synopsis: This book brings together all the principal evidence demonstrating conspiracy in the assassination of President Kennedy and shows the linkage to radical U.S. Rightists.
book.title_long: The Radical Right and the Murder of John F. Kennedy: Stunning Evidence in the Assassination of the President
